title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 755.9 - Quality assurance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 ยง 755.9 - Quality assurance

State Regulations

In addition to the requirements set forth in section
751.8
of this Title, the operator
shall ensure that there are reviews of the appropriateness and necessity of
procedures performed, operative complications and circumstances leading to
hospitalization. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
ยง
755.9

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
